title: Possession
description: A young woman left her family for an unspecified reason. The husband determines to find out the truth and starts following his wife. At first, he suspects that a man is involved. But gradually, he finds out more and more strange behaviors and bizarre incidents that indicate something more than a possessed love affair.

reviews.text: The BEST HORROR MOVIE OF 2008!!!Sarah Michelle Gellar Does A Great Job!The Plot Is Very Creative, And Is Never Even The Least Bit Dull!Most Of The Cast Is Very Good! :) I Can Watch This Movie Over & Over!
Two brothers are in comas after a car crash and one wakes up and pretends to be the other one, just returned in the wrong body, so that he can get it on with his brother's wife.
